forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Haze before 2pm, then haze and showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. High near 86, with temperatures falling to around 76 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 12 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 11pm, then haze and showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. Low around 60, with temperatures rising to around 62 overnight. Northwest wind 5 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between three quarters and one inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 7am, then haze and showers and thunderstorms between 7am and 8am, then haze and scattered showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 69. North northeast wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy smoke before 8pm, then a slight chance of rain. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 55. North northeast wind 3 to 8 mph.

forecast.name: This Afternoon

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
